arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – Possible Paris lineup for and risk of suspensions
arts.sum: This Wednesday, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) will face FC Barcelona (12th) at the Montjuïc Stadium in the second matchday of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 pm, CET). arts.sum: FC Barcelona will be determined to deliver a statement performance when Paris Saint-Germain visit the Lluis Companys Olympic Stadium later today. While it is not a knockout tie, the occasion carries all the intensity and anticipation of a final. arts.ttl: Laporta talks Flick, Lamine, Luis Enrique, Figo, Champions League ahead of Barcelona vs PSG
arts.sum: In a few hours, one of the most highly anticipated UEFA Champions League matches of the season will get underway as Barcelona take on PSG at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys. Ahead of kickoff, officials from both clubs, including Barcelona president Joan Laporta and his PSG counterpart Nasser Al-Khelaifi met for the traditional executives’ lunch. arts.ttl: ‘I love this team’ – Luis Enrique reveals his appreciation for Hansi Flick’s Barcelona
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain head coach Luis Enrique has moved to reveal his appreciation for the ongoing excellence of La Liga heavyweights Barcelona. This of course comes ahead of the upcoming showdown…

While this is not a knockout tie, the stakes feel high given how dominant both sides have been over the past year. Last season, Barcelona reached the semi-finals before falling to Inter Milan in dramatic fashion. arts.ttl: Barcelona phenom raring to go ahead of PSG clash -‘I’m back, and the mission is also back’
arts.sum: As Barcelona gear up for their high-stakes UEFA Champions League clash against Paris Saint-Germain, teenage sensation Lamine Yamal has made it clear that he feels no pressure going into one of the biggest games of the season. The young forward recently returned to action after battling discomfort, an issue that became worse during the demanding […] The post Barcelona phenom raring to go ahead of PSG clash -‘I’m back, and the mission is also back’ appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Possible Barcelona lineup against PSG with Lamine Yamal back in action
arts.sum: With Lamine set to start for Barça, Ferran Torres or Marcus Rashford are candidates to perform from the off with Robert Lewandowski likely to spearhead the attack for the current LaLiga leaders. After almost a month out of action, the teenager participated in more than thirty minutes of the matchday seven LaLiga game against Real Sociedad and showed plenty of flair which suggests that his back and groin problems are things in the past.

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – Excellent news for Paris!
arts.sum: This Wednesday, second-placed Paris Saint-Germain will face 12th-placed FC Barcelona at the Montjuïc Stadium in Matchday 2 of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET). A few hours before kick-off, RMC Sport is reporting positive news for Paris. arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona squad list to face PSG – key player returns
arts.sum: FC Barcelona have confirmed their squad list for the highly anticipated Champions League clash against Paris Saint-Germain on matchday two of the group stage. The biggest news is the return of Alejandro Balde, who has been sidelined since early September with a muscle injury.
